text: nivu avarige adamara ibbaru putrara naija ghataneyannu tilisiri. Avaribbaru balidana nididaga, avara paiki obbana balidanavu svikrtavayitu mattu innobbanadu svikrtavagalilla. Avanu – ‘‘nanu khandita ninnannu vadhisuttene’’ endanu. Avanu (modalaneyavanu) uttarisidanu; ‘‘allahanantu, (yavudannu) dharmanistharinda matra svikarisuttane‘‘
